summary: E-commerce website for GreenLeaf online plant store with premium animated UI, smooth scrolling, parallax effects, and modern micro-interactions. Frontend-only implementation with static product data and browser-based cart.
architectural_notes: Frontend-only implementation with no backend or database
Static product data hardcoded in code files
Glassmorphism design with soft green/beige color palette
Animation library for smooth parallax and scroll effects
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero section full-width plant photograph with soft natural lighting, lush greenery filling frame (hero-plants.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Floating monstera leaf illustration with transparent background for hero animation (monstera-float.dim_400x400.png)
- Small potted succulent plant photo on white background (succulent-1.dim_400x400.png)
- Fiddle leaf fig tree in ceramic pot photo on white background (fiddle-leaf.dim_400x400.png)
- Snake plant in modern pot photo on white background (snake-plant.dim_400x400.png)
- Pothos trailing plant photo on white background (pothos.dim_400x400.png)
- Peace lily plant with white flower photo on white background (peace-lily.dim_400x400.png)
- Rubber plant in terracotta pot photo on white background (rubber-plant.dim_400x400.png)
- ZZ plant in minimal pot photo on white background (zz-plant.dim_400x400.png)
- Calathea ornata plant photo on white background (calathea.dim_400x400.png)
- Bird of paradise plant photo on white background (bird-paradise.dim_400x400.png)
- String of pearls succulent photo on white background (string-pearls.dim_400x400.png)
- Aloe vera plant photo on white background (aloe-vera.dim_400x400.png)
- Boston fern hanging plant photo on white background (boston-fern.dim_400x400.png)
- Cactus variety collection photo on white background (cactus-mix.dim_400x400.png)
- Water droplet icon illustration in soft green (icon-water.dim_64x64.png)
- Sun icon illustration in warm yellow (icon-sun.dim_64x64.png)
- Leaf growth icon illustration in green (icon-growth.dim_64x64.png)
- Eco-friendly badge icon illustration (icon-eco.dim_64x64.png)
- Free shipping truck icon illustration (icon-shipping.dim_64x64.png)
- Plant care guide book icon illustration (icon-care-guide.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Create home page with full-screen animated hero section featuring cinematic plant visuals, slow floating animation on plants/leaves, smooth fade and slide text animation, subtle background gradient movement, and scroll indicator animation
Add featured categories section with hover animations where cards lift slightly on hover, implement image zoom with soft shadow expansion, and include smooth hover transitions on buttons
Implement best-selling plants carousel with smooth sliding transitions and navigation controls
Create benefits section with animated icons that trigger on scroll into view
Add testimonials section with automatic sliding carousel animation
Create newsletter signup section with soft motion effects and input animations
Build shop page with animated product grid that reveals items with fade and upward motion on scroll, using staggered timing for sequential appearance
Add filter sidebar with sliding interaction that smoothly expands and collapses, including animated filter selection with visual feedback
Implement hover preview effects on product cards with image zoom and shadow expansion
Add smooth pagination transitions between product pages

Create product detail page with image gallery featuring smooth transitions between images, animated care indicators for water and sunlight with icon animations, expandable accordion sections, and related products slider
Build plant care guide page with blog layout, scroll-triggered animations for article entries, and sticky reading progress bar that tracks scroll position

Implement slide-in cart drawer animation that opens from the side with smooth motion, including add-to-cart animation where plant item visually moves to cart icon, and smooth quantity update transitions
Create checkout page interface with smooth form transitions and validation animations
Build sticky transparent navbar that adds blur background on scroll, with animated menu underline following active page, and smooth fullscreen mobile menu transition
Implement smooth inertia scrolling throughout the site with parallax scrolling between sections where plants float slightly while scrolling and sections transition seamlessly without hard cuts
Add wishlist heart animation with smooth toggle interaction that responds to user clicks
Implement smooth page-to-page transitions using fade or slide effects between route changes
Create loading animation using leaf or growing plant concept that appears during page transitions or data loading

Apply minimal luxury eco aesthetic with soft green and earthy tones, beige backgrounds, glassmorphism effects, soft shadows, clean grid system with large breathing space, and Apple-quality polish combined with organic natural motion
Create static product data with example plants including names, descriptions, prices, images, care requirements (water, sunlight levels), categories, and availability status
Implement frontend-only shopping cart using browser storage (localStorage) that persists cart items, quantities, and total calculations without backend integration
Ensure all animations feel smooth, lightweight, and premium while maintaining fast loading performance and avoiding excessive motion that could harm usability
Make website fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop with appropriate breakpoints and mobile-optimized interactions

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with animated hero, featured categories, best-selling carousel, benefits section, testimonials, and newsletter
Shop page with animated product grid, filter sidebar, hover effects, and pagination
Product detail page with image gallery, care indicators, accordion sections, and related products slider
Plant care guide blog layout with scroll-triggered animations and reading progress bar
Cart & checkout with slide-in drawer and smooth quantity transitions
Sticky transparent navbar with blur on scroll and animated mobile menu
Smooth scrolling with parallax effects, fade-in reveals, and floating plant animations
Micro-interactions: add-to-cart animation, wishlist heart, filter selection, button effects
Implement button ripple or glow effect on interaction for all primary action buttons
Add smooth dropdown expansion animations for all dropdown menus and select controls
